title: update on keen kitchen counter game
content:
if anyone remembers my one topic asking for help on some keen engine a while back (in which most of was lost in the attack) then they may remember the last version I released of the beta which had commander keen shrunk by his own invention trapped on his kitchen counter, well most of the bugs are completly worked out and development is in full force, I don't want to release another demo until the game is complete but I will post some new screen shots:
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/yodablob/keen_air.JPG[/img]
-keen stands on the invisible block hidden in the paper level (can you read the backround)
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/yodablob/keen_screen.JPG[/img]
-keen is in his sink and finally regrets his decision not to clean the dirty dishes who have come back to give him a sharp jab in the butt!

more soon!

title: Re: update on keen kitchen counter game
content:
Ah! Wonderful! Just what I needed, virgin blood!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

Er, I mean, interesting looking game, look forward to a nonbuggy release soon!

[And I don't think I've ever met you before; I'm Levellord, could you losen these straightjacket straps, they're cutting off my circulation.]

A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: update on keen kitchen counter game
content:
It'd be cooler if we could actually tell it was a kitchen counter, and objects weren't incredibly out of proportion. I mean, it looks like someone could stick 40 of those knives in the faucet at once.-----
[img]http://gnosticus.spatang.com/PBF056BCPuppyWish.jpg[/img]

title: Re: update on keen kitchen counter game
content:
I'm glad you guys like the look of it...I think.
Level Lord- Nice to meet you too.
Harvy- lol, thanks.
allstories- the "overworld" where you travel to each level is the kitchen counter part, the levels are the things laying on the counter such as paper and the sink. And yes the sink level is incredibly out of proportion, but if the knifes were any bigger keen too would have to be bigger (and I like the way the huge faucet looks.)
thanks for the comments, new screens to come shortly.

title: Re: update on keen kitchen counter game
content:
Keen: Tell me again why I want to buy knives so small I could shove a hundred up a typical faucet?

Salesman: Actually, you can only put 40 up there! And think how little cleaning you'd have to do!
A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: update on keen kitchen counter game
content:
allright. The game is almost complete (sorry its been taking so long) I'd like to add another update, the title art. I finished it two days ago and I beleive it is a huge improvement over my last one. well here it is!
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/yodablob/keen_title.PNG[/img]
yeah, release is comming...

title: Awersome!!!
content:
"Commander Keen in: The Counter Crusades"

Nice title; I also like his helmet!!! You really put some good time and effort into this. I can't wait to evade the dishes (BTW - My daily chores are washing the dishes [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] )

Cool Game

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Awersome!!!
content:
About the title screen: try to change the "Counter Crusades" font. Increase the size, make it bold, add some depth, add shadows, do some light effects or something, but don't leave it that way.
The other things looks great.----

title: Re: Awersome!!!
content: Haha, very cool! Looks awesome. The name is fun, but I suggest the same than above: change the "in Counter Crusades" fonts, they don't look good that way.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Awersome!!!
content:
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/yodablob/keen_title2.PNG[/img]
hows that?
Ok, the game is basically complete, but I need somebody with some experience with game maker code to help me out here (I'm not to good with code, and Im don't know how to do things after creating a basic engine.) I need help on things such as making the score system look like it does in keen 4-6, having variables such as ammo and the score carry over from one room to the next, and fixing some of the bugs that are still left. I also need a beta tester.
You will both get your own spot in the opening credits ofcourse, so if you are interested be sure to reply!

content:

title: Recomendation:
content:
Have it sent as a zip, but change the extension to .duh (which isn't associated with any particular file type). When harvey gets it, he downloads it, and changes the extension to .zip. Then, walla!!!

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Recomendation:
content:
I don't see the point of that Najawa.
I sent it as a zip Harvey sorry about that.
-yodablob, who still needs a programmer.

title: Gmail:
content:
Well... I use Gmail, and Gmail will not let you send exicutables, nor zips containing .exe's. That was a trick to bypass .exe filtering.

I had that trouble when I sent my first demo of my mod (Armageddon II) to Andy Durdin for hosting.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Gmail:
content:
Here are all the bugs I found.

-Long loading time(might not be fixable)
-Clicking paddle war sends you to the main game
-You walk straight thru certain enemies
-You should go behind certain tiles but you don't(only do this where it makes sense)
-When you enter the soda bottle, the music stays the same, but when you exit the soda bottle, the music resets
-An error occurred when I exited the last levelSigned, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
"I always try to consume interesting animals."-LevelLord

title: Re: Gmail:
content:
NOt sure what you mean with the tile bug? which tiles, could you maybe email me a pic or example or something?
The enemies that keen can walk through will eventually bump keen, but I can't do this without keen getting stuck to the enemy (thats where coder is needed)
The last level bug is because I haven't yet made the ending sequence.
